data.name: Twitter clone, made with Django
data.description:
Chirper is a Twitter-clone that I made as a hobby project in order to practice Django and Bootstrap. It is going to be a blog where users can register, login and logout; make, edit and delete posts. All of the users who are logged in can see the posts that are made, but only the user who made the post can edit/delete it. Users can also visit other users profile to see what only that particular person has been posting. 
 My takeaways from this project include: managing models, views and templates; an introduction to user registration, login and logout functionality; and using forms.

data.name: Twitch bot
data.description: This is a hobby project I am currently coding, using TwitchIO, as wanted to make a bot for a friend who streams (which makes the bot rather optimised for Guild Wars 2 streams). It implements Spotify API and uses asynchronous coding. This project taught me a great deal about HTTP requests and async coding in general.
